title: Canyon admits that gravel bikes are just 90s mountain bikes with Grizl Throwback edition
content:
If you are an old cyclist lamenting the loss of rigid 90s drop-bar mountain biking options, Canyon’s new limited edition Grizl CF SL 7 Throwback…

The post Canyon admits that gravel bikes are just 90s mountain bikes with Grizl Throwback edition appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
